articles.title: Lincoln artist creates 52-foot-long flying canvas
articles.description: LINCOLN, Neb. (AP) — It’s a bird. It’s a plane. It’s a flying work of art.
articles.content:
LINCOLN, Neb. (AP) Its a bird. Its a plane. Its a flying work of art.
